pain_relief_services.title: Deep Tissue Massage
pain_relief_services.view_details: Therapeutic massage targeting deeper muscle layers
pain_relief_services.description: A deep tissue massage designed to release chronic muscle tension and relieve pain in targeted areas, improving circulation and flexibility.

pain_relief_services.title: Cupping Therapy
pain_relief_services.view_details: Traditional cupping therapy for pain relief
pain_relief_services.description: Cupping therapy uses suction cups to stimulate blood flow and ease muscle pain, stiffness, and inflammation.

pain_relief_services.title: Thermal Therapy (Heat Therapy)
pain_relief_services.view_details: Heat packs for muscle relaxation and pain relief
pain_relief_services.description: Thermal therapy involves the use of heat packs to soothe and relax tense muscles, alleviate pain, and reduce stiffness.

pain_relief_services.title: TENS Therapy (Transcutaneous Electrical Nerve Stimulation)
pain_relief_services.description: TENS therapy uses low-voltage electrical currents to relieve pain and improve muscle function, providing relief from chronic pain.

pain_relief_services.title: Acupressure Therapy
pain_relief_services.view_details: Pressure points to relieve pain and tension
pain_relief_services.description: Acupressure therapy targets specific pressure points on the body to alleviate pain, reduce stress, and promote healing.

pain_relief_services.title: Joint Pain Relief Treatment
pain_relief_services.view_details: Therapy for joint pain relief and mobility improvement
pain_relief_services.description: A targeted treatment to relieve joint pain, reduce inflammation, and restore mobility using therapeutic techniques and muscle manipulation.

pain_relief_services.title: Cold Compression Therapy
pain_relief_services.view_details: Cold compress for reducing pain and swelling
pain_relief_services.description: Cold compression therapy helps reduce inflammation, swelling, and pain, especially effective after physical exertion or injury.
